articles.content:
DPRK FM and his party leave for Colombia 
     Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, Foreign Minister of the DPRK, and his party left here today to participate in a meeting of foreign ministers of non-aligned countries, which is to be held in Colombia.

articles.title: KEDO delegation leaves
articles.content:
KEDO delegation leaves 
      Pyongyang, April 4 (KCNA) -- The negotiating delegation of the Korean Peninsula Energy Development Organization (KEDO), which came here for the signing of a protocol related to the implementation of an agreement on the light water reactors provision concluded by the DPRK and KEDO, left here today by air.
